commit.message:
Updating to latest cargo 1.2.3, h2 1.3.168 and maven-site-plugin 3.1

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1367484 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -307,7 +307,7 @@ under the License.

               <cargo.rmi.port>${cargo.rmi.port}</cargo.rmi.port>
 
-<!--                            <cargo.jvmargs>-Xdebug -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,address=8000,server=y,suspend=n</cargo.jvmargs>-->

             </properties>
             <configfiles>
